data.title: Demi Moore/Ashton Kutcher
data.meta_description: <p>If love catches two people, then that is all that matters.  But how do you explain a GUY marrying a WOMAN who is 16 years older than him?  Not only do I find that a little bit disgusting, but confusing.  If Ashton Was…
data.text:
If love catches two people, then that is all that matters. But how do you explain a GUY marrying a WOMAN who is 16 years older than him? Not only do I find that a little bit disgusting, but confusing. If Ashton Was Demi’s age, and Demi Ashton’s age, maybe that would be a little bit more acceptable, but rarely.

In 10 years, if still married, Demi will be Ashton’s grandma.

Well, if your grandma is 16 years older than you, it’s a reproductive miracle.

Hahaha. Although, agreed; age gaps can be disturbing. But whatever, love > all, right?

come on, she’s only in her 40s…she won’t have to worry about that for another…5 years. she’s going to be a real handful during menopause. I’d get rid of her asap if I were him.
